actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide full benefits for disabled widows and widowers without regard to age (subject to limited adjustments to reflect any previous reductions in their benefits).
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to provide full benefits under title II for disabled widows and widowers without regard to age.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide full benefits for disabled widows and widowers without regard to age (subject to limited adjustments to reflect any previous reductions in their benefits).
